title: Bouillabaisse Marseillaise
ingredients: ['For the base', '1 conger eel head and/or enough fish heads/tails or small fish suitable for making stock', '12 small green crabs or small shellfish', '8 tomatoes', '2 small leeks, sliced', '1 sprig of fennel', '4 onions, sliced', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '1 bouquet garni', '1 teaspoon orange zest', 'freshly ground pepper', 'olive oil as needed', 'salt', 'For the bouillabaisse', '2kg assorted rock fish including (if available) - red mullet (rouget), sea bass (loup), cukoo wrasse (labre)', '1kg mussels, preferably large ones', 'olive oil as needed', '2 teaspoons of saffron', '1kg potatoes, optional (potatoes are only used for a Toulon Bouillabaisse)']
